text: From her bedroom window, Anna watched the city fall asleep, streetlights blinking like fireflies.
scene: Anna looking out her window at a nighttime city street with blinking lights

text: A tiny robot rolled across her desk, carrying a note: "Our park is fading. Can you help?"
scene: small tin robot on Anna's desk holding a tiny note, city lights visible outside

text: Anna followed the robot to the rooftop, where a hidden elevator of gears waited.
scene: Anna and the small robot standing by a gear-filled elevator on a rooftop at night

text: The elevator opened into a secret city park filled with miniature robots and dim lanterns.
scene: hidden rooftop park with tiny robots, dim paper lanterns, and little trees

text: A taller caretaker robot explained, "Our lantern cores are cracked. The park needs light to stay alive."
scene: gentle caretaker robot speaking to Anna, showing cracked lantern cores

text: Anna gathered shards of colored glass and started fitting them into the lantern frames.
scene: Anna piecing colored glass into lanterns on a workbench, robots handing her tools

text: The small robots fetched copper wire. Anna twisted it into spirals to hold the glass together.
scene: Anna twisting copper wire, tiny robots passing wire coils, lanterns taking shape

text: They needed light. A firefly drone fluttered in, offering a spark from its glowing tail.
scene: tiny drone shaped like a firefly hovering over a lantern, Anna guiding it

text: Each lantern lit up, one by one, casting warm patterns across the park.
scene: row of lanterns lighting up, colorful light on the grass, robots cheering

text: Near the fountain, the water pumps were silent. Anna cleaned dust from their gears.
scene: Anna kneeling by a fountain, wiping gears clean while robots watch

text: She added a drop of oil and turned the crank. Water sprang up, catching lantern light like gems.
scene: water shooting up in the fountain, lantern reflections sparkling, Anna smiling

text: A chorus of tiny robots began to play music on tin drums, filling the park with soft beats.
scene: small robots drumming on tin cans and pipes, lanterns glowing above

text: The caretaker showed her a wilted metal tree. Its leaves were dull and still.
scene: a metal tree with unmoving leaves, Anna examining it, robots gathered around

text: Anna polished each leaf with a cloth. They unfolded like fans, catching lantern light and shimmering.
scene: Anna polishing leaves, metal leaves unfolding and reflecting warm light

text: A gentle breeze spun the leaves, creating soft chimes that made the robots dance.
scene: metal tree leaves spinning and chiming, robots dancing under them

text: The caretaker robot gifted Anna a small lantern with her name etched into the glass.
scene: caretaker handing Anna a glowing lantern etched with 'Anna', rooftop city in background

text: "Wherever you bring light, parks will grow," it said.
scene: close-up of the caretaker speaking kindly to Anna, lantern light on their faces

text: The hidden elevator returned her to her rooftop. The city below now glowed a little warmer.
scene: Anna stepping out onto her rooftop, city lights brighter below

text: The tiny robot saluted and rolled back into the night.
scene: small robot giving a salute on the rooftop edge before disappearing

text: In her room, the engraved lantern flickered softly, casting little robot-shaped shadows on her wall.
scene: Anna's bedroom with the lantern glowing, shadows of robot shapes on the wall
